short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Groups tabs into windows based on AI tagging

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ClusterTabs is a web extension that automatically organizes your tabs into windows using AI-driven tagging.

By analyzing the titles and URLs of your open tabs, it intelligently clusters related tabs together, helping you reduce clutter, improve productivity, and find the tabs you need faster.
